title: Records of communication of Professor Robert Burns

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: Records of communication of Professor Robert Burns
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All email correspondence – including attachments, CC and BCC – between Dr. Robert Burns, Distinguished Professor in the Department of Biosystems Engineering and Soil Science, and the following:

National Pork Producers Council, or email domains ending in @nppc.org
Smithfield Foods, or email domains ending in @smithfield.com or @smithfieldfoods.com
JBS Foods USA, or email domains ending in @jbssa.com or @jbs.com

The University can limit the time frame for this request from February 1, 2022 to the present.

Please narrow the search results to exclude any published papers, news articles, organizational newsletters or other widely available published materials.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Hana Mensendiek.
